channel.title: Adding a teleport

item.title: Adding a teleport
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

add a check to the command.

if (command...) { if (playerRights > ...) { ... } else { ... } }

item.title: Adding a teleport
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

This? And inside the donator commands method you need to add it not under.

if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; c.getPA().startTeleport(2905, 3611, 0, type); c.sendMessage("Welcome to home!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a teleport
item.dc:creator: @tubefish tubefish
item.description:
@tubefish wrote:

Okay so i went to the bottom of the command.java and this is what i put in

if (playerCommand.equals("home") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2905, 3611, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to home!"); }

Heres a pic

Here is the compile problem

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:647: error: class, interface, or enum expected if (playerCommand.equals("home") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:649: error: class, interface, or enum expected } c.sendMessage("Welcome to home!"); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:650: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
